André Valdestilhas

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/9893245203357826
  • Última atualização do currículo em 06/09/2019

Master's degree in Science at area of Computer Engineering by the Technological Institute of Aeronautics (ITA-Brazil), holds a degree in Computer Science from the University of Great Abc (2003). He has experience in Computer Science, with an emphasis on Software Engineering and Multimedia, acting on the following subjects: Linked Data, Computer Vision, Affective Computing, Interactive Digital Television, HCI and Multilateration algorithms applied to the system Automatic Dependent surveillance. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Projetos de pesquisa
2011 - 2013
Automatic Dependent Surveillance System (SVDA)
Descrição: Researching on technologies for Air Traffic Control to increase airspace utilization, operational efficiency, flexibility and mainly its safety. Applied to multilateration and hyperbolic positioning algorithms on Systems of Automatic Dependance Surveilance..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.
Alunos envolvidos: Mestrado acadêmico: (1) Doutorado: (1) .

Integrantes: André Valdestilhas - Integrante / Guiou Kobayashi - Coordenador / Anderson Avilla - Integrante.
Financiador(es): Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico - Bolsa.
2006 - 2009
Project HARPIA
Descrição: Computational Intelligence Applied to Fraud Detection Customs..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.
Alunos envolvidos: Graduação: (1) / Mestrado acadêmico: (2) / Doutorado: (3) .

Integrantes: André Valdestilhas - Integrante / Carlos Henrique Quartucci Forster - Coordenador / Joubert de Castro Lima - Integrante / Roberto Pitaco - Integrante / Rodrigo Rocha - Integrante / Osvandre Martins - Integrante.
Financiador(es): Fundação de Desenvolvimento da UNICAMP - Bolsa.

Outras informações relevantes

 
Recent areas of research: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Linked Open Data (LOD), Affective Computing, Interactive Digital TV, HCI.

Since 1997 in computer science, and since 1999 working with systems development. Working with Java technology since 2001 and since 2004 as a researcher.
Deep knowledge in requirements gathering, modeling, implementation, testing and certification systems. Strong involvement with the team of software quality. Development of software documentation, reports, opinions, proposals and technical reports.
Knowledge of SQL Server, Oracle, Rational Rose Real Time, OR and advanced Visual Basic, Java, C (ANSI), Dot NET, C #, ASP, Database (MS Access), Crystal Reports, UML, Power Designer, Microsoft Sharepoint Integration of Intelligent Transportation Systems. Relevant scientific publications since 2004.
